thread.section_title: Entertainment and Leisure Businesses For Sale in the US
thread.title: Plant Rental Business

title: Plant Rental Business
text: Questions Business Summary Plant Rental Business -- They Provide Plants, Flowers, Palm trees and more to the Convention & Exhibition shows & events. They do about $800,000 in Gross sales with a net of about $165,000. The selling price is less than 3 times earnings. The firm asking price is $495,000 Rent for the 3 Greenhouses and 2 storage buildings and 3 acres of land is about $4,200 per mo. This location is in 2 East Coast Convention Cities. If you like Palm Trees, Flowers & plants you will love this 35 year old profitable business. Financials
